page.title: 06Kinloch Hotel Shiskine
page.content:
Kinloch Hotel is the largest hotel in Blackwaterfoot and takes about 93 guests.It is busy all year round.In the summer many tourists stay there.
In winter many local activities take place in it. Kinloch has a swimming pool, in which the island primary schools gala takes place and the sub-aqua club meets. It also has a squash court which is very popular. The village bridge club and the island G.& S. Society meet each week. The local drama club rehearse there and it is the place where weddings, birthday parties, whist drives and farmers society meetings are held. The hotel has keen darts and pool teams.
This is truly the social community centre of the area.
